paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the TTR gene in the context of transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis (ATTR-CA) and mentions a specific variant, Glu61Lys, along with its clinical significance and penetrance data.

individual_records.phenotype_details: calcified particles observed in the interstitial area surrounding cardiomyocytes
individual_records.evidence_sentence: In addition, in the sample of a patient with hereditary ATTR-CA with the Glu61Lys TTR mutation, calcified particles were also observed in the interstitial area surrounding cardiomyocytes.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with calcified particles in cardiac tissue.

variants.additional_notes: Only one case of the Glu61Lys variant was mentioned.
key_quotes: In addition, in the sample of a patient with hereditary ATTR-CA with the Glu61Lys TTR mutation, calcified particles were also observed in the interstitial area surrounding cardiomyocytes.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as only one variant in the TTR gene was reported.
